name: Filepattern Generator
title: Filepattern Generator
description: Filepattern Generator plugin creates a csv or feather file containing a number of new filepatterns, where each filepattern will subset the data in the directory
author: Hamdah Shafqat Abbasi (hamdah.abbasi@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Input image collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: chunkSize
inputs.description: Number of images to generate collective filepattern

inputs.name: groupBy
inputs.description: Select a parameter to generate filepatterns in specific order

inputs.name: outFormat
inputs.description: Output Format of collective filepatterns. Only Supports (CSV and feather) file format. (default file format is CSV)

ui.title: chunkSize
ui.description: Number of images to generate collective filepattern

ui.title: groupBy
ui.description: Select a parameter to generate filepatterns in specific order
